name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to give me a haiku.”
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader and read me a poem.”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me something.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is a small skill that reads out a haiku from a selection of poems.
Ask Haiku Reader for a haiku and receive a neat little haiku - simple!
Try saying “Alexa, ask Haiku Reader for a haiku” or “tell me a poem” to receive a haiku.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
